name: Solar Power Expansion
description: A large-scale solar farm supplying renewable electricity to the city grid.

name: Community Wind Energy
description: Installation of community-owned wind turbines for rural electrification.

name: EV Charging Network
description: Development of fast-charging stations across major highways.

name: Electric Bus Fleet
description: Transition of public buses from diesel to electric operation.

name: Carbon Capture Facility
description: New carbon capture system to reduce industrial CO2 emissions by 90%.

name: Green Steel Plant
description: Steel production using hydrogen instead of coal to lower carbon footprint.

name: Net-Zero Housing Project
description: Residential community powered entirely by renewable energy sources.

name: Smart Energy Retrofit Program
description: Upgrading old buildings with energy-efficient lighting and HVAC systems.

name: Precision Farming Initiative
description: Using satellite and IoT sensors to optimize fertilizer and water use.

name: Organic Composting Facility
description: New composting site processing 500 tons of waste per month.

name: Urban Forest Project
description: Tree planting program across the city to absorb carbon and improve air quality.

name: Wetland Restoration Program
description: Restoring 2,000 hectares of wetland to promote biodiversity and carbon storage.
